Package de.oth.blocklib.shaders

Interface Shader

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Shader>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdditiveLightShader, AnimatedShader, BaseShader, BillboardShader, CloudShader, DebugGridShader, DeferredLightShader, DeferredShader, FluidShader, GBufferShader, GUIShader, HeightMapShader, LineShader, OverlayShader, PrecipitationShader, ScrollTextureShader, ShaderDemo.DemoShader, ShaderProgram, ShadowShader, SkyboxShader, SpecularShader, SpriteSheetShader, StaticShader, TransparentShader
public interface Shader
extends java.lang.Comparable<Shader>

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cleanUp()  
    void disableVertexData()
    Disables all VertexArrayAttributes of the mesh and unbinds the vaoID
    void enableVertexData​(int vaoID)
    Binds the vaoID and enables all VertexArrayAttributes of the mesh
    int getPriority()  
    void loadGlobalUniforms()
    Load all GlobalUniforms that are used by this shader
    void loadInstanceData​(Renderable renderable)
    Loads instance-specific uniform data, that is only relevant to a single object
    void loadMaterial​(Material material)
    Loads all shader uniforms of the given material
    void render​(int vertexCount)  
    void start()  
    void stop()
